PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Some notes about PoB:
Yes there is Aspect of the spider here, it is to emulate the shock damage increase we gain from ascendancy. I don't actually use it.
Cast While Channeling Support (level 18) is in my links because for some reason... POB isn't adding the extra More damage multiplier it provides from the staff
List of buffs that can be found on my Jewel:
===Buffs from Ascendancy, Offerings, Consecrated Ground, Auls, etc...=== Gain 15% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield 4% of maximum mana regenerated per second 50 mana regenerated per second 150% Increased Critical Strike Chance +18% to all elemental resistances ===This is to simulate the 15% increased Damage taken from our shock=== Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill Aspect of the Spider Reserves no Mana
